# Echopad AI

> HIPAA-compliant healthcare AI platform that reduces provider burnout by 40%, cuts administrative costs by 60%, and increases revenue by 20%. Offering AI Scribe, AI Receptionist, AI Admin Assistant, ReferCare, and performance analytics solutions for healthcare organizations.

## About Echopad AI

[Homepage](https://echopadai.com): Echopad AI is a comprehensive healthcare AI agent platform specializing in clinical documentation, patient engagement, and operational automation. Built for healthcare providers to reduce administrative burden and improve patient care quality.

## AI Products & Solutions

[AI Scribe](https://echopadai.com/ai-scribe): Automated clinical documentation that reduces charting time by 70%. HIPAA-compliant AI transcription with real-time ambient listening, automatic SOAP note generation, and seamless EHR integration (Epic, Cerner, Athena). Pricing starts at $299/month. Supports multiple specialties and generates billable documentation.

[AI Receptionist](https://echopadai.com/ai-receptionist): 24/7 automated call handling and appointment scheduling that reduces no-shows by 30% and saves $60K+ annually. Features intelligent call routing, appointment confirmation, patient intake, insurance verification, and multi-language support. Pricing at $599/month. Handles 1000+ calls monthly.

[AI Admin Assistant](https://echopadai.com/ai-admin-assistant): Workflow automation that saves 3+ hours per admin per day. Automates prior authorizations, insurance verification, claims processing, patient follow-ups, and administrative task management. Pricing at $399/month. Reduces administrative costs by 60%.

[AI Patient Reminders](https://echopadai.com/ai-patient-reminders): Automated patient reminder system that reduces no-shows by 30% and recovers $50K+ annually. Features intelligent appointment reminders, medication reminders, follow-up scheduling, and multi-channel communication (SMS, email, voice). Pricing at $299/month.

[Benchmark - Performance Analytics](https://echopadai.com/benchmark): Comprehensive healthcare operations analytics and performance tracking. Real-time dashboards, provider productivity metrics, revenue cycle analytics, and operational KPIs. Pricing at $499/month. Provides actionable insights for practice optimization.

[ReferCare - Referral Management](https://echopadai.com/refercare): Automated referral management system that reduces processing time by 80%. Features automated referral tracking, specialist network coordination, patient communication, and outcomes monitoring. Pricing at $399/month. Improves care coordination and patient retention.

[EchoPad Insights](https://echopadai.com/echopad-insights): Advanced analytics platform providing deep insights into practice performance, patient outcomes, and operational efficiency. Custom reporting, predictive analytics, and AI-powered recommendations.

## Key Benefits & ROI

- **Cost Reduction**: 60% reduction in administrative costs through AI automation
- **Revenue Increase**: 20% revenue growth from recovered billable time and reduced no-shows
- **Staff Retention**: 40% improvement in provider and staff retention by reducing burnout
- **Time Savings**: 70% reduction in documentation time, 3+ hours saved per admin daily
- **Patient Satisfaction**: 95% patient satisfaction rate with AI-powered engagement
- **Annual Savings**: $200K+ in combined cost savings and revenue recovery

## Technical Specifications

- **HIPAA Compliance**: Full HIPAA compliance with enterprise-grade security and data encryption
- **EHR Integration**: Native integration with Epic, Cerner, Athena, and other major EHR systems
- **Multi-Language Support**: English, Spanish, Mandarin, and 50+ additional languages
- **Real-Time Processing**: Millisecond-level response times for critical workflows
- **Scalability**: Cloud-native architecture supporting practices of all sizes
- **API Access**: RESTful APIs for custom integrations and workflow automation
- **Uptime**: 99.9% guaranteed uptime with 24/7 technical support

## Industries & Specialties Served

Primary care, cardiology, orthopedics, mental health, pediatrics, OB/GYN, dermatology, urgent care, multi-specialty groups, and hospital systems. Suitable for solo practitioners to large healthcare organizations.

## Pricing & Plans

Individual product pricing ranges from $299 to $599 per month. Custom enterprise packages available with volume discounts. All plans include onboarding, training, and ongoing support. 30-day money-back guarantee. No long-term contracts required.
